trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Palm Springs
There were no other sightings in Palm Springs on or around June 23rd 1999
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Palm Springs, Ca., I was on my way to wash the car, the moon was fulland over to the east, i noticed an object coming from below the moon and crossedits face then stopped about 5 degrees above the moon for about 2 to 3 minutesand then decented to the south of the moon and then crossed it once again to thenorth where it hovered for about 10 minutes over the city of Desert Hot Springs,the object was triangler in shape stood upright and rotated reflecting the sunslight every 2 to 3 seconds, i continuted on my way and lost track of the object,but noticed it once again about 30 minutes later over the city of Palm Desert,Ca., kept my eye on it for about 10 minutes and then it started to disappear andlost track.WERE THERE ANY OTHER WITNESS TO THIS EVENT?
